StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDuplicateProspect]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN varchar(9) = null, @LastName varchar(75), @FirstName varchar(75) = null, @PhoneNumber varchar(25), @Street varchar(75) = null, @City varchar(30) = null, @County varchar(50) = null, @State varchar(2) = null, @ZipCode varchar(9) = null, @SubSta.onType varchar(1)
AS
DECLARE @Catch int
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
BEGIN SELECT Pros.ProspectId, Pros.PersonId, P.LastName, P.FirstName, P.MiddleName, P.SocialSecurityNumber, P.AlienRegistra.onNumber, P.Gender, PP.PhoneNumber, PA.Street1, PA.City, PA.County, PA.State, PA.ZipCode FROM Person P INNER JOIN Prospect Pros ON P.PersonId=Pros.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN PersonPhone PP ON P.PersonId=PP.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN PersonAddress PA ON P.PersonId=PA.PersonId WHERE (Pros.SubSta.onType = @SubSta.onType) AND ( --SSN is the same as an exis.ng record --Last Name and phone number are the same as an exis.ng record --Last Name and address are the same as an exis.ng record --First Name and phone number are the same as an exis.ng record --First Name and address are the same as an exis.ng record
(P.SocialSecurityNumber = @SSN) OR (P.LastName = @LastName AND (PP.PhoneNumber=@PhoneNumber AND PP.PersonPhoneTypeId=1) ) OR (P.LastName = @LastName AND (PA.Street1 = @Street AND PA.City=@City AND PA.County=@County AND PA.State=@State AND PA.ZipCode=@ZipCode)) OR (P.FirstName = @FirstName AND (PP.PhoneNumber=@PhoneNumber AND PP.PersonPhoneTypeId=1) ) OR (P.FirstName = @FirstName AND (PA.Street1 = @Street AND PA.City=@City AND PA.County=@County AND PA.State=@State AND PA.ZipCode=@ZipCode)) )
END
END
